name: Ebay Clone
short_description:
http://www.phpscriptsmall.com/product/ebay-clone-script/

Ebay Clone Script

Get your own eBay style website with our script. With this Ebay Clone script you can kick-start your web auction business with a site that is familiar to your users and can be up in running in no time. You can generate more revenue with our eBay clone by advertising banners, membership plans and commission model.

Feature
•	Full Featured Admin Panel
•	Complete Invoice Control System
•	Customizable Categories
•	Full WYSIWYG Editing
•	Reverse Auctions, Dutch Auctions, Ebay Style Auctions
•	Buy it now and make an offer
•	Built in Shipping integration calculator
•	Various Payment Gateway’s supported
•	Want Ads, Vouchers, Stores
•	SSL Support
•	Feed Back System
•	SEO friendly
